org.melior.jdbc.enhancer

Interface StatementEnhancer


  • public interface StatementEnhancer
    Interface for implementations that enhance SQL statements to provide functionality that the JDBC driver, DataSource or underlying database lacks.

    Examples are, generating sequence numbers for a database that does not support identity columns, sequence columns or table triggers, and implementing NULL support for a database that does not provide it, like Cassandra.

    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Melior

    • Method Detail

      • getStatement

        Statement getStatement(DataSource dataSource,
                       Connection connection,
                       String statementText,
                       String[] keyColumnNames)
                throws SQLException
        Get and enhance statement.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The data source
        connection - The database connection
        statementText - The statement text
        keyColumnNames - The auto generated key column names
        Returns:
        A statement that matches the statement text, or null if no statement could be found
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs
